r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $558.1K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with 175 303 Canada. The average
  contract duration was 4.09 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.5M. The longest
  contract was 5.17 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.9M.
lookup_name: '175 303 CANADA'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '558.1K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '100%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '44%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '4'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '218.1K'
s424_mean_duration: '4.09'
s421_mean_contract_value: '2.5M'
s425_max_duration: '5.17'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.9M'
